I take it this was working for you before?
 
The only relevant change I can=
 see has been made lately is to
src/java/org/archive/crawler/admin/ui/JobCo=
nfigureUtils.java
Stack made some changes yesterday to fix a bug with readi=
ng seeds. That
probably broke something on Windows. Try reverting to versio=
n 1.6 of that
file and see it that works. If so, Stack broke something, alt=
hough I don't
see anything suspicious in his commit.
 
- Kris
